tool_description: Manages real-time audio stream buffering, handling incoming audio data and providing consistent chunk delivery for processing.

overlap_ms.description: Overlap between consecutive buffers in milliseconds (0-200)

max_silence_ms.description: Maximum silence duration before buffer flush (100-5000)

error_messages: Invalid stream handle: Provide a valid stream handle from Audio Stream Initializer.
Buffer underrun: Audio stream is not providing data fast enough for real-time processing.
Buffer overflow: Processing is too slow, causing audio data loss.
Invalid buffer duration: Buffer duration must be between 100-2000 milliseconds.
Invalid overlap duration: Overlap must be between 0-200 milliseconds and less than buffer_duration_ms.
usage: Provide stream_handle from initialized audio stream. Configure buffer_duration_ms, overlap_ms, and max_silence_ms as needed. Returns buffered audio chunks ready for processing.

audio_chunk_id.description: Unique identifier for this audio chunk

chunk_duration_ms.description: Actual duration of the audio chunk

samples_count.description: Number of audio samples in this chunk
